sentences.en: Elinor, conning over every injunction of distrust, told herself likewise not to hope.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺细细领会每一句叫她不抱信心的暗示, 同样告诫自己不要作过奢的指望.

sentences.en: He get an injunction prevent the company from selling his car.
sentences.cn: 他获得阻止公司出售他汽车的禁令.

sentences.en: He got an injunction against vexatious litigation by his enemies.
sentences.cn: 他由于敌人的诬告而被法庭下达了一项禁令.

sentences.en: He had an injunction out against him today.
sentences.cn: 今天他接到了法院的警告书.

sentences.en: He took out a court injunction against the newspaper demanding the return of the document.
sentences.cn: 他取得了法院强制令，要求报社归还那份文件。

sentences.en: If this injunction was transgressed, destruction was sure to fall on the offenders.
sentences.cn: 这个禁令若有违犯, 违者必遭杀身之祸.

sentences.en: In spite of his mother's injunction, Kit turned sharply round to look.
sentences.cn: 不顾母亲的训令, 吉特还是伶俐地转过头去一望.

sentences.en: Injunction were formerly obtained by writ but now by a judicial order.
sentences.cn: 禁令原来要通过令状获得,现在则要通过司法命令.

sentences.en: Injunction. This is a court order issued to a defendant.
sentences.cn: 禁令, 是指法庭对被告颁布的命令.

sentences.en: The court granted the plaintiff an injunction restraining the defendant from breaching copyright.
sentences.cn: 法院应原告申请签发禁令,制止被告侵犯版权.

sentences.en: The court has issued an injunction.
sentences.cn: 法院已发布一项强制令.

sentences.en: The granting of an injunction is at the discretion of the court.
sentences.cn: 强制令的筌发的属于法院的自由裁量权.

sentences.en: The judge refused to grant an injunction.
The legal adviser recommended applying for an injunction against the directors of the company.
sentences.cn: 法律顾问建议申请针对公司董事会的强制令.

sentences.en: The pert injunction was like those crystal substances.
sentences.cn: 这个悍然的命令就像晶体物质一般.

sentences.en: The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages.
sentences.cn: 原告请求的救济为强制令和损害赔偿金.

sentences.en: They failed to obtain an injunction.

trans.tran_en: an order given by a court, which tells someone not to do something
